intro: HyperDot is a minimal action arcade masterpiece with one rule: dodge everything.
description:
Dodge everything in over 100 trials on campaign mode, outlast your friends in local multiplayer battles, or build your own custom challenges with the level editor.

CAMPAIGN MODE: Dodge your way through over 100 hand-crafted trials in the single player campaign
BETTER WITH FRIENDS: Supports up to 8 players with easy drop-in/drop-out system that gets you and your friends in-game fast
LEVEL EDITOR: Create your own one-of-a-kind levels with unlimited possibilities, from dizzying patterns to relentlessly difficult challenges
NEVER PLAY THE SAME GAME TWICE: Extensive gameplay customization offers more than 1 million enemy, arena, and modifier combinations
PLAY WITHOUT COMPROMISES: HyperDot features high contrast mode, colorblind mode, and disable background animations
